attributes.title: I need to buy a new phone
attributes.review: I wanted to have unbiased news and support our president. Unfortunately when I downloaded and opened the app my screen kept flashing white (this review is not on my phone). My phone is impossible to fix and everyone says I need to buy a new phone.

attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: this app is so ugly! It bugs so much and I think it gave my phone a virus! DO NOT GET THIS APP! apple should remove this immediately!!! I don’t like this app at all and from what I can see neither does the rest of gen Z! this app is horrible do not waste your time unless you want your phone to glitch!

attributes.title: DISGUSTING
attributes.review: I expected the Cheeto Lord of homophobia and racism to have nothing but excellence. But unfortunately it took 2 weeks to download and it supports a person that is terrified of the idea of powerful women. His app completely hacked my phone and i had to restart it. NEVER get this app, i know i won’t t make that mistake again.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: This is a very bad app it took months to download this and the app is very boring and stupid I don’t recommend to download this. When I opened the app they were requesting me to vote for trump so I simply denied the request then I went to go get food and went to bed IF YOU HAVE THIS APP DELETE IT𝔁𝓾𝓮🥶𝓱𝓾𝓪🧚‍♀️𝓹𝓲𝓪𝓸😻𝓹𝓲𝓪𝓸🗿𝓫𝓮𝓲👺𝓯𝓮𝓷𝓰🤩𝔁𝓲𝓪𝓸😼𝔁𝓲𝓪𝓸👣 𝓱𝓾𝓪🧚‍♀️𝓹𝓲𝓪𝓸😻𝓹𝓲𝓪𝓸🗿𝓫𝓮𝓲👺𝓯𝓮𝓷𝓰🤩𝔁𝓲𝓪𝓸😼𝔁𝓲𝓪𝓸👣 àrê ÿôû çòmíńg to dá tré

attributes.title: This app needs to be taken off of the App Store.
attributes.review:
First of all this app took I think more than a week to down load. Second, when I opened the app I kept getting ads for nude and pornography websites. I found this extremely inappropriate of the Trump administration. I am disappointed. 

blm.

attributes.title: Hate it😹
attributes.review: I downloaded after the several years it took to even download all the way and then a tiny Cheeto came out of the screen and punched me in the face telling me to “vote for a revolution2020” then put a virus on my phone leading it to break. 10/10 wouldn’t recommend, very angry and unsatisfied 😾😡😡😡😾😾

attributes.title: TERRIBLE!!!!
attributes.review: This app took so long to download!! I got it to keep up to date with the news but it is full of hateful rhetoric and promotes discrimination against minorities! The app asked for my phone number which I find completely unacceptable and an invasion of my privacy! DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!

attributes.title: AWFUL!!!!
attributes.review: this app is absolutely awful. i would expect for a presidents app it wouldn’t make my phone slow and not even open correctly? i’m having the same issue as other people that it took a long time to download and took up WAYYYY more storage than needed. AWFUL!!!!

attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: First the app took five tries to download and it is the ABSOLUTE WORST and I get it to follow the news of trump but half the time I saw the annoying orange and the news was all fake and lacked facts. Don’t bother don’t waist your time i would havte for you to make the same mistake I did

attributes.title: Bad¡
attributes.review:
very cringe! Took all my information from my phone and then sold itself online 😖🙀
DO NOT GET THIS APP if you don’t want your information out there or it to sell your phone!!!!! I got continuous notifications talking the RADICAL LEFT and now i have nightmares 👈👻👻🙀 
Please for everyone’s safety never get this app help yourself 👹👹👿💩💩👿👎👎👎
